description: GSIS player ID. Available if stat_type = 'player'.

Short player name as listed in play-by-play data. Please keep in mind that this name is not always unique for one player and can change from season to season and sometimes even within a season. Do not group by this variable. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
Full name of player. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
Position of player. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
Position group of player. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
URL to a player headshot image. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
The NFL season
The NFL week. Available if summary_level = 'week'
One of 'REG', 'POST', or 'REG+POST'
The nflverse game id of the form '{season}_{week}_{away abbreviation}_{home abbreviation}'. Available if summary_level = 'week'
Most recent team player appears in data with. Available if stat_type = 'player' & summary_level = 'season'.
Team stats are counted for.
The opponent team in that week. Available if summary_level = 'week'.
The number of games where stats were counted. Available if summary_level = 'season'.
The number of completed passes.
The number of pass attempts as defined by the NFL.
Yards gained on pass plays.
The number of passing touchdowns.
The number of interceptions thrown.
The Number of times sacked.
Yards lost on sack plays.
The number of sacks with a fumble.
The number of sacks with a lost fumble.
Passing air yards (includes incomplete passes).
Yards after the catch gained on plays in which player was the passer (this is an unofficial stat and may differ slightly between different sources).
First downs on pass attempts.

Total expected points added on pass attempts and sacks. NOTE: this uses the variable `qb_epa`, which gives QB credit for EPA for up to the point where a receiver lost a fumble after a completed catch and makes EPA work more like passing yards on plays with fumbles.
Completion percentage over expectation
Two-point conversion passes.
Passing Air Conversion Ratio. PACR = `passing_yards` / `passing_air_yards`. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
The number of passes that gained 10 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of passes that gained 16 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of passes that gained 20 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of passes that gained 40 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of official rush attempts (incl. scrambles and kneel downs). Rushes after a lateral reception don't count as carry.
Yards gained when rushing with the ball (incl. scrambles and kneel downs). Also includes yards gained after obtaining a lateral on a play that started with a rushing attempt.
The number of rushing touchdowns (incl. scrambles). Also includes touchdowns after obtaining a lateral on a play that started with a rushing attempt.
The number of rushes with a fumble.
The number of rushes with a lost fumble.
First downs on rush attempts (incl. scrambles).
Expected points added on rush attempts (incl. scrambles and kneel downs).
Two-point conversion rushes.
The number of runs that gained 10 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of runs that gained 12 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of runs that gained 20 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of runs that gained 40 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of pass receptions. Lateral receptions officially don't count as reception.
The number of pass plays where the player was the targeted receiver.
Yards gained after a pass reception. Includes yards gained after receiving a lateral on a play that started as a pass play.
The number of touchdowns following a pass reception. Also includes touchdowns after receiving a lateral on a play that started as a pass play.
The number of fumbles after a pass reception.
The number of fumbles lost after a pass reception.
Receiving air yards (incl. incomplete passes).
Yards after the catch gained on plays in which player was receiver (this is an unofficial stat and may differ slightly between different sources).
First downs on receptions.
Expected points added on receptions.
Two-point conversion receptions.
The number of receptions that gained 10 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of receptions that gained 16 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of receptions that gained 20 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
The number of receptions that gained 40 or more yards. Some define this as an 'explosive' play.
Receiver Air Conversion Ratio. RACR = `receiving_yards` / `receiving_air_yards`. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
The share of targets of the player in all targets of his team. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
The share of receiving_air_yards of the player in all air_yards of his team. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
Weighted Opportunity Rating. WOPR = 1.5 × `target_share` + 0.7 × `air_yards_share`. Available if stat_type = 'player'.
The number of touchdowns scored in special teams plays.
Solo tackles.
Tackles where another player assisted.
Assist to another player's tackle.
Tackles for loss.
Yards lost by the opposing team through a tackle.
Forced fumbles.
Number of Sacks.
Yards lost by the opposing team through a sack.
Number of QB hits
Interceptions caught.
Yards gained after interceptions.
Number of defended passes.
Defensive touchdowns.
Number of fumbles while playing on defense.
Tackles that resulted in a safety.
Yardage gained/lost that doesn't fall into any other category. Examples are blocked field goals or blocked punts.
Recovered fumbles where the ball was fumbled by own team.
Yardage gained/lost by a player after he recovered a fumble by his own team. Includes yardage gained/lost where a team mate recovered a fumble and lateraled the ball to the player.
Recovered fumbles where the ball was fumbled by opposing team.
Yardage gained/lost by a player after he recovered a fumble by the opposing team. Includes yardage gained/lost where a team mate recovered a fumble and lateraled the ball to the player.

Touchdowns scored after a fumble recovery. This can be in any unit. And both the own team and the opposing team can have fumbled the ball initially. Includes touchdowns where a team mate recovered a fumble and lateraled the ball to the player.
Penalties caused.
Yardage lost through penalties.
Number of timeouts taken by team. Available if stat_type = 'team'.
Number of punts returned.
Yardage gained/lost by a player during a punt return.
Number of kickoffs returned.
Yardage gained/lost by a player during a kickoff return.
Successful field goal attempts.
Attempted field goals.
Missed field goals.
Attempted field goals that were blocked.
Distance of longest made field goal.
Percentage of successful field goal attempts.
Successful field goal attempts where distance was between 0 and 19 yards.
Successful field goal attempts where distance was between 20 and 29 yards.
Successful field goal attempts where distance was between 30 and 39 yards.
Successful field goal attempts where distance was between 40 and 49 yards.
Successful field goal attempts where distance was between 50 and 59 yards.
Successful field goal attempts where distance was 60+ yards.
Missed field goal attempts where distance was between 0 and 19 yards.
Missed field goal attempts where distance was between 20 and 29 yards.
Missed field goal attempts where distance was between 30 and 39 yards.
Missed field goal attempts where distance was between 40 and 49 yards.
Missed field goal attempts where distance was between 50 and 59 yards.
Missed field goal attempts where distance was 60+ yards.
Distances of all successful field goal attempts.
Distances of all missed field goal attempts.
Distances of all blocked field goal attempts.
Sum of distances of all made field goals.
Sum of distances of all missed field goals.
Sum of distances of all blocked field goals.
Successful extra point attempts.
Attempted extra points.
Missed extra points.
Extra points blocked by opponent.
Percentage of successful extra point attempts.
Successful game winning field goal attempts.
Attempted game winning field goals.
Missed game winning field goals.
Game winning field goal attempts blocked by opponent.
Distance of game winning field goal attempt. Available if summary_level = 'week'.
Distances of game winning field goal attempts. Available if summary_level = 'season'.
Kicked punts.
Kicked punts that were blocked.
Longest punt kicked.
Length of punts kicked.
The number of punts where the RETURN ended inside the opponent's 20 yard line.
The number of punts that went out of bounds without return.
The number of punts downed without return.
The number of punts that resulted in a touchback.
The number of punts that resulted in a fair catch.
The number of punts that were returned by the opponent team.
The punt return yardage of the opponent team.
The number of punts that were returned for a touchdown by the opponent team.
Net punt yardage. Equals `pt_yards` - `pt_return_yards` - `pt_touchback` * `20`.
Standard fantasy points.
PPR fantasy points.
